name: storyboard-platform
description: AI-Powered Storyboarding Platform for Professional Filmmaking

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:ai" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:ai" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
